actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to require cigarette packages to disclose the quantity of tar and nicotine contained in the cigarettes in the packages.

summary.text: Requires cigarette packages to disclose the quantity of tar and nicotine contained in the cigarettes in the packages under the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1333)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to require cigarette packages to disclose the quantity of tar and nicotine contained in the cigarettes in the packages.
